name: Drum Cloud
description:
DRUM CLOUD

WARNING: THIS GAME INCLUDES FLASHING IMAGES

THE FLYING Vs WERE A PEACEFUL AND MUSICAL RACE, THEN ONE DAY DISASTER STRUCK. THE MUSIC HAS BEEN STOLEN!

HELP THE FLYING Vs RECAPTURE THE MUSIC TO RESTORE THE FUTURE OF THEIR WORLD.

SHOOT THE LASERS AT FLOATING BALLOONS TO RECLAIM THE MUSIC. PLAY IN TIME WITH THE BEATS FOR PERFECT HITS. IN SCORE ATTACK MODE, EACH PERFECT HIT INCREASES YOUR SCORE MULTIPLIER.

WITH THE BUILT IN "MICRO TRACKER" SEQUENCER, YOU CAN ALSO CREATE YOUR OWN BACKING TRACKS PLAY ALONG TO.

MOVE: CURSOR KEYS

FIRE: SPACE

PAUSE: P

CREDITS

SOUNDSCAPE: TIM CANT

CODING + LANDSCAPE: TGD

TESTING: PETER AND WILL
